lines.speaker: first murderer
lines.text: But who did bid thee join with us

lines.speaker: second murderer
lines.text: He needs not our mistrust, since he delivers Our offices and what we have to do To the direction just.

lines.speaker: first murderer
lines.text: Then stand with us. The west yet glimmers with some streaks of day: Now spurs the lated traveller apace To gain the timely inn and near approaches The subject of our watch.

lines.speaker: banquo
lines.text: [Within]  Give us a light there, ho!

lines.speaker: second murderer
lines.text: Then tis he: the rest That are within the note of expectation Already are i the court.

lines.speaker: third murderer
lines.text: Almost a mile: but he does usually, So all men do, from hence to the palace gate Make it their walk.
Enter BANQUO, and FLEANCE with a torch

lines.speaker: banquo
lines.text: O, treachery! Fly, good Fleance, fly, fly, fly! Thou mayst revenge. O slave!

lines.speaker: third murderer
lines.text: Who did strike out the light

lines.speaker: third murderer
lines.text: Theres but one down the son is fled.

lines.speaker: second murderer
lines.text: We have lost Best half of our affair.

lines.speaker: first murderer
lines.text: Well, lets away, and say how much is done.
